c1.name: The Flame Incandescent
c1.descriptionRaw:
Dehya's Max HP is increased by 20%, and she deals bonus DMG based on her Max HP when using the following attacks:
路<color=#FFD780FF>Molten Inferno</color>'s DMG will be increased by 3.6% of her Max HP.
路<color=#FFD780FF>Leonine Bite</color>'s DMG will be increased by 6% of her Max HP.
c1.description:
Dehya's Max HP is increased by 20%, and she deals bonus DMG based on her Max HP when using the following attacks:
路Molten Inferno's DMG will be increased by 3.6% of her Max HP.
路Leonine Bite's DMG will be increased by 6% of her Max HP.

c2.name: The Sand-Blades Glittering
c2.descriptionRaw:
When Dehya uses <color=#FFD780FF>Molten Inferno: Ranging Flame</color>, the duration of the recreated Fiery Sanctum field will be increased by 6s.
Additionally, when a Fiery Sanctum exists on the field, DMG dealt by its next coordinated attack will be increased by 50% when active character(s) within the Fiery Sanctum field are attacked.
c2.description:
When Dehya uses Molten Inferno: Ranging Flame, the duration of the recreated Fiery Sanctum field will be increased by 6s.
Additionally, when a Fiery Sanctum exists on the field, DMG dealt by its next coordinated attack will be increased by 50% when active character(s) within the Fiery Sanctum field are attacked.

c3.name: A Rage Swift as Fire
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Leonine Bite</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Leonine Bite by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: An Oath Abiding
c4.descriptionRaw: When Flame-Mane's Fist and Incineration Drive attacks unleashed during <color=#FFD780FF>Leonine Bite</color> hit opponents, they will restore 1.5 Energy for Dehya and 2.5% of her Max HP. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s.
c4.description: When Flame-Mane's Fist and Incineration Drive attacks unleashed during Leonine Bite hit opponents, they will restore 1.5 Energy for Dehya and 2.5% of her Max HP. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s.

c5.name: The Alpha Unleashed
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Molten Inferno</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Molten Inferno by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: The Burning Claws Cleaving
c6.descriptionRaw:
The CRIT Rate of <color=#FFD780FF>Leonine Bite</color> is increased by 10%.
Additionally, after a Flame-Mane's Fist attack hits an opponent and deals CRIT Hits during a single Blazing Lioness state, it will cause the CRIT DMG of Leonine Bite to increase by 15% for the rest of Blazing Lioness's duration and extend that duration by 0.5s. This effect can be triggered every 0.2s. The duration can be extended for a maximum of 2s and CRIT DMG can be increased by a maximum of 60% this way.
